description:
Spanish Verb Conjugation is the first in a series of apps that will help you conjugate verbs into common and not so common forms. If you have ever tried to learn a new language then you know one of the most difficult areas is in learning useful verbs and how to conjugate them. Spanish typifies this with the large selection of conjugation forms (moods) like Present, Past, Future, Imperfect Past, Gerund and many more. 

Using Spanish Verb Conjugation app you will find that more than 600 verbs are available with full conjugation tables. You can search in Spanish or English for the verb you want and as you type it will show up in the list. Click the verb and see immediately on the left window all the forms laid out in standard format by tense. Unusual, Uncommon or Irregular forms are highlighted in the list. 

Spanish Verb Conjugation app is perfect for study o reference. Whether you are a native speaker, a student, or a self learner, you will find Spanish Verb Conjugation the perfect reference app for you.
